      protected int price

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MeleeWeapon

      public MeleeWeapon​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int damage, java.lang.String verb, int hitRate)
      Constructor.
      参数:
      name - name of the item
      displayChar - character to use for display when item is on the ground
      damage - amount of damage this weapon does
      verb - verb to use for this weapon, e.g. "hits", "zaps"
      hitRate - the probability/chance to hit the target.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getDropAction

      public DropItemAction getDropAction​(Actor actor)
      从类复制的说明: Item
      Create and return an action to drop this Item. If this Item is not portable, returns null.
      覆盖:
      getDropAction 在类中 Item
      参数:
      actor - an actor that will interact with this item
      返回:
      a new DropItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

      public boolean setPrice​(int price)
